title: Someone is trying to register a new phone on my account. What do I do?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [Parang na-scam ako sa GCash. Ano ang dapat gawin?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/43503782056985-Parang-na-scam-ako-sa-GCash-Ano-ang-dapat-gawin)

- [I noticed unauthorized transactions in my GCash account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4416637093145-I-noticed-unauthorized-transactions-in-my-GCash-account-What-do-I-do)
- [The GCash app keeps crashing or shows a white screen when I login](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38913561930777-The-GCash-app-keeps-crashing-or-shows-a-white-screen-when-I-login)
- [I want to transact offline with GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38911689985049-I-want-to-transact-offline-with-GCash-What-do-I-do)

[See more](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/360004657834-Account-Security)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)

- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If someone is trying to register a different phone, watch the video below to learn more:

### **If you received an SMS with an OTP**

Disregard the OTP that was sent, and never share it with anyone. [Change your MPIN](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/35221433022361-I-want-to-change-my-GCash-MPIN) to secure your GCash account.

### **If you received an SMS on phone registration verification**

If you received an SMS with the message " **For your safety, we will verify your phone registration request to make sure it’s you**" or " **Congratulations, Account Secure ka na!**", chat with Gigi and type **report unknown phone**. Prepare the following documents:

- One (1) [**valid government ID**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786)
- A **selfie** holding your valid ID

### **What happens after I report the unknown phone?**

One of our customer service representatives will review your report. Please expect a reply within **24 hours**.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [Account Secure](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005597526)
- [I want to use GCash on another phone or device](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/36302878095385)

- [I lost the SIM or phone where my GCash account is registered](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900006457043)
- [My phone got damaged or broken and I can’t access GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/36303727371289)
